about_the_game:
Welcome to "Paper Arcade: MindField Edition"! Get ready to test your strategy and logic skills in this exciting and challenging game of minesweeper.

In this game, you will navigate through a paper minefield, using your logic and strategy to find and flag all the hidden mines. Each square of the minefield contains a number that represents the number of mines surrounding it. Use this information to carefully flag each mine and clear the field without detonating any explosives.

But be careful! One wrong move could set off a chain reaction of explosions, ending the game in a fiery blast. As you progress through the game, the minefield will become larger and more complex, requiring even more precision and strategic thinking to navigate.
